name: Night Realm
description:
"Let the wishing well hear your story. It will help you with your problems"

Every day, more and more students disappeared from existence. However, it's not their concern. They are finding a way to search for their father's whereabouts. 

One night, they are pulled into another world and they didn't know a way back home. Maybe it's a punishment for being ignorant and indifferent to other people?

Can they find a way to go back to their world?

(A project that I made by myself in a span of 3 months for my school portfolio)
